com.mindfusion.charting.swing

Class Dashboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • com.mindfusion.charting.swing.Dashboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mindfusion.charting.components.RootControl, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chart

    public class Dashboard
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements com.mindfusion.charting.components.RootControl, java.awt.print.Printable
    A control that contains multiple chart plots and gauges and manages their layout.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
